the list

This is the list. It’s a list of links to stuff I find interesting and want to keep track of for later reference.

I have categorized it into two categories as you see below. If you have any suggestions, feel free to contact me. this is a very early work in progress.

Websites

  • noodlemac - apple software reviews
  • low end mac - get more out of your mac
  • macnn - dead site, but one of the first.
  • the sweet setup - reviews of the best apps for Mac and iOS
  • macintouch - the first apple site by ric ford. est 1995.
  • pixobebo - Kate MacKenzie on Apple
  • macsurfer - apple news and links
  • 9 to 5 Mac - apple news and more.
  • daring fireball - John Gruber’s linked list
  • macstories - apple news and opinion
  • the loop - apple news and links
  • Other World Computing - Apple upgrades and accessories
  • OEMPCWORLD- memory upgrades and accessories
  • droid life - Android phone reviews and news
  • MemoryX - The Earth’s Biggest Memory Store
  • Apple - the mother ship
  • The Brooks Review - personal blog of Ben Brooks
  • DealMac - deals on Macs
  • refurb.me - buy a refurbished Apple product
  • macprices - compare prices on new and refurbished Macs
  • Data Memory Systems - apple and pc memory upgrade vendor
  • shawn blanc - personal blog of shawn blanc
  • john.do - personal blog of John Saddington
  • G5 Center - PowerMac G5 Resource
  • Riccardo Mori - Personal Blog about Mac and Technology
  • Spotify - spotify web player
  • distrowatch - Linux OS tracker

Software

  • caret - markdown editor for mac/win/linux
  • byword - markdown editor for the mac
  • iA writer - distraction free text editor
  • Todist - cross platform to-do list manager
  • inbox - Google’s inbox email app
  • focus writer - distraction free text editor
  • simplenote - a simple not all for all platfor
  • desk - notetaking and blogging app for Mac
  • Marxico - markdown writing tool with evernote sync
  • Google Play Music - Google’s streaming music site
